metadata.title: CVE-2024-53123 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:

below, sk_wait_data() can return (witherror) with the underlying socket disconnected and a zero rcv_mss.Catch the error and return without performing any additionaloperations on the current socket.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53123` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
